import React, { useState } from 'react' import '../SideBar/SideBar.css' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {FontAwesomeIcon} from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faHouse,faUser,faSuitcaseRolling,faPlaneUp,faGear} from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' function Sidebar({onSelectionChange}) { const [activeItem, setActiveItem] = useState(null); // Function to handle item click const handleItemClick = (item) => { setActiveItem(item); }; return ( <>
  • handleItemClick('home')} >   Home
  • handleItemClick('profile')}>   Profile
  • handleItemClick('packages')}>   Packages
  • handleItemClick('deals')}>   Deals
  • handleItemClick('settings')}>   Settings
) } export default Sidebar
